text: Hello. Do you know if its possible to open a popup from a Custom Card?. Not a HubSpot popup but a browser popup with window.popup()
No, although I'm interested in knowing what you are trying to do

I'm still trying fo find the best option to integrate Twilio Flex.

I was trying to create a custom card to open twilio flex in a Popup because I want to reference that popupt on other contacts with a click to dial button.

Thanks, this is not entirely pop-up but you can look at the GIF and if interested fill out the form for early access. <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C05R599UA12/p1698343284704159>

We will keep everyone posted when we release pop-ups too. Also, do join <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions>
